name: Get the number of commits per hour in each day
description:
Each array contains the day number, hour number, and number of commits:

*   `0-6`: Sunday - Saturday
*   `0-23`: Hour of day
*   Number of commits

For example, `[2, 14, 25]` indicates that there were 25 total commits, during the 2:00pm hour on Tuesdays. All times are based on the time zone of individual commits.

responses.description: For example, `[2, 14, 25]` indicates that there were 25 total commits, during the 2:00pm hour on Tuesdays. All times are based on the time zone of individual commits.
